definitions: The action of bringing or coming together again to support a common cause.
The action of recovering or regrouping after a setback.
The action of making a comeback in a game or competition.
The action of improving in health or strength.
examples: The team was rallying support for the new initiative.
After the defeat, the troops were rallying their spirits.
The stock market is rallying after a sharp decline.
He is rallying from his illness.
